All Classes

Class Description
BlueTower
Implements the behaviour of the blue tower Keeps track of its own projectile Attack speed varies by distance to target
BlueTowerProjectile
Implements the behaviour of the blue tower's projectile
ClickFunctionality
Indicates that a class will use mouse inputs
Client
Used to establish connection to a server and send/retrieve data from it.
ConcreteMessage1
A simple message class.
ConstantIntEnum
Enum dedicated to loading constants (int) from a configuration file.
Enemy  
EnemyTracker  
ExampleModel
A simplistic model that can be observed and updated.
GameLogic  
GameWindow
Builds the game window to be displayed to the user during gameplay.
GreenEnemy
implements the monster behaviour for GreenEnemy
HighScoreWindow
Displays top 10 high score from the server
InvisEnemy
implements the monster behaviour for InvisEnemy
Main
Class used for the launch sequence
MainMenu
Creates the main frame for the game and the main menu switchable container.
MapGenerator
Class used for generating maps for the game of size GRID_HEIGHxGRID_WIDTH It randomizes the biome, number of lakes and monster path
MapHandler
Loads/saves maps using int[][] to/from a textfile
MapMakerWindow
Content panel for the map maker Holds the map maker UI and handles user input for it
MapPanel
The panel where the map is drawn/held during its creation.
MapPanelIfc
Map panel interface requires: threadInit, threadStop, setBuildMode, saveMapAs, clearMap, randomMap
MikeyEnemy
implements the monster behaviour for MikeyEnemy
MonsterFactory
Creates monsters based on input parameters
MonsterFactory.Builder  
MouseControls
Singleton mouse controller Add actions by adding an implementation of ClickFunctionality using setClickUser(ClickFunctionality user)
Observable<M,​T>  
ObservableSupport<M,​T>
A support class intending to be a type-safe alternative to java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport.
Observer<M,​T>  
ObserverMessage  
Panel
The class that draws everything
Player
Singletone class to keep track of everything related to the player and their progress.
PopupInfo
Class used to create warning dialog windows.
ProjectileTracker
Manages the active projectiles and gets rid of the inactive ones
RedEnemy
implements the monster behaviour for RedEnemy
RedTower
Implements behaviour of the red tower Keeps track of its own projectiles
RedTowerProjectile
Implements behaviour of the red tower's projectile
RoundTracker  
SaveData
Saves game data into textfile.
SoundPlayer  
SpawnEnemies  
SpookeyEnemy
implements the monster behaviour for SpookyEnemy
SwitchableWindow
Indicate that this content pane can be swapped in/out Contains method to return displayable container and method to switch to a new switchable window.
TextureHandler
Class dedicated to loading and distributing textures Textures are loaded by name from default location TextureHandler is able to tell the program if the texture load was successful or not
Tile
responsible for translating the different numbers sent in by TileMap to corresponding image
TileMap
Turns int array into the map
TowerProjectile
Interface for the projectiles.
TowerTracker
Class used to keep track of active towers and current build mode for towers.
UserInterface
Methods needed to update the information to the player during gameplay Contains methods to update gold, score, health and rounds.
Window
Used to indicate if a class is window/display area
YellowEnemy
implements the monster behaviour for YellowEnemy
YellowTower
Implements the yellow tower's behaviour
YellowTowerProjectile
Implements yellow tower's projectile behaviour
